descriptions: Providing continued website maintanence for a web design client entailing theme customizations, 3rd-party integrations, and installing/maintaining analytics software.
Updating website images, color schemas, product information and creating new webpages and forms as necessary.
Designing an online education platform built upon ReactJS and Node with express middleware.
Creating an online learning curriculum platform with course registrations and certifications of completion
Coordinating with the project owner on implementing deliverables and making renditions to the website’s product design and functionality
Implemented and tested the performance of equities trading strategies using Alpaca’s API and finviz data
Accessed SEC filings and parsed document data using Node and Python to gather financial data and press release information
Handled financial data APIs to screen stock data and develop scanners/backtesting strategies for trading equities
Co-developed code bases analyzing social media sentiment and stock liquidity to automate trading decisions based on volume and price action
Contributed to developing a financial API encapsulating data from Finviz website and other accessible financial data resources to consolidate stock market information
Customized template file code on Shopify and WordPress to develop and design websites’ front end for various clientele
Created responsive, cross-browser website designs using HTML, CSS and Liquid
Implemented various widgets (image sliders, social media feeds, etc.) and interactive website components using JavaScript
Integrated analytics software and corroborated with marketing teams to optimize SEO and user traffic
